name: Zilhoes
description:
In an attempt to explain to his friends about relevant information, our hero is massacred by the troll spirit who dominated his friends and left the computer invading his home. Your mission is to get to the modem to turn it off. A game about an inner joke among friends.

My name is Lucas Carvalho I have been an illustrator and animator since 2009, in 2018 I started studying game development, so try an indie developer career. Zilhoes is my first game I'm developing while studying. I hope you like it, and post your feedback in the comments!
